1.content:
You’re a 17-26 male and you’ve found yourself shrunken to 3 inches in TLK.

Who would find you? Anthros or Ferals?

(Note: Good chapters will be sent coins.)
1.title: Intro

11.content: Alright. Are you in TLK 1 or TLK 2?
11.title: Anthros

111.content: Pre or During Scar’s reign?
111.title: Before or During Scar’s kingdom.

1111.content: Where have you found yourself shrunken?
1111.title: Where are you?

choices: Mufasa walking around the pridelands with Sarabi.
A den full of sleeping lions but you’re trapped in a lioness’s palm.
11111.content: You’re 3 inches and stuck in the pridelands. But who’s around you or where are you?
11111.title: Pridelands

info.brief_description: You’ve found yourself shrunk in TLK. Who will find you?
info.description:
You’re a male ages 17-26 and you find yourself shrunken at 3 inches in the Pridelands or Outlands.

All characters from TLK can find you shrunken. Male or Female.
There will be a choice in the beginning for if you want feral or anthro.(anthros are tribal.)

Fetishes that are very welcome: Scat, piss, All Vore, farts, paws, musk.

Fetishes that are not welcome: balloons, slime, absorption and other fetishes like that.

I would not prefer death but it is allowed but only after a long series of chapters.

Macros may be nice or mean. Pridelanders could be more maternal/paternal or loving if they decide to adopt your tiny form as a pet or cub while the hyenas or the outlanders could be more sexually devious.

Chapters must he at least a paragraph. It keeps the story nice to read and interesting.

Have fun!
